rowObjects.data:
{{
  {
    form_id: this.params.form_id,
    stage: this.params.stage,
    role: this.params.role,
    required_user_id: this.params.required_user_id || "",
    required_user_name: this.params.required_user_name || "",
    name: this.params.name || "",
    position: this.params.position || "",
    action_date: this.params.action_date || "",
    decision: this.params.decision || "Pending",
    comment: this.params.comment || "",
    approved_at: this.params.decision === "Approved" ? moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss") : "",
    commented_at: this.params.decision !== "Approved" && this.params.comment ? moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss") : "",
    signed_by_user_id: this.params.signed_by_user_id || appsmith.user.email,
    created_at: this.params.created_at || moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"),
    updated_at: this.params.updated_at || moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")
  }
}}
